2154.subject: BUS
2154.descrlong: Economics as a social science is applied to understand the structure and function of the U.S. economy. We examine the institutions within the economy and macroeconomic concepts to understand the economy, from business cycle fluctuations through determinants of economic growth & decline. Through service learning in a local community, students examine issues of personal identities, social responsibility, and skills to develop equitable communities.(Offered every term: classroom-based or hybrid.)
